mapper.select: SELECT *, pc.parent_id cateParentId, l.id ladder_id,l.product_id ladder_product_id,l.discount ladder_discount,l.count ladder_count,l.price ladder_price, pf.id full_id,pf.product_id full_product_id,pf.full_price full_full_price,pf.reduce_price full_reduce_price, m.id member_id,m.product_id member_product_id,m.member_level_id member_member_level_id,m.member_price member_member_price,m.member_level_name member_member_level_name, s.id sku_id,s.product_id sku_product_id,s.price sku_price,s.low_stock sku_low_stock,s.pic sku_pic,s.sale sku_sale,s.sku_code sku_sku_code,s.dynamic_pros sku_dynamic_pros ,s.sp1 sku_sp1,s.sp2 sku_sp2,s.sp3 sku_sp3,s.stock sku_stock, a.id attribute_id,a.product_id attribute_product_id,a.product_attribute_id attribute_product_attribute_id,a.value attribute_value, ins.product_id instalment_product_id, ins.pay_periods instalment_pay_periods FROM pms_product p LEFT JOIN pms_product_category pc on pc.id = p.product_category_id LEFT JOIN pms_product_ladder l ON p.id = l.product_id LEFT JOIN pms_product_full_reduction pf ON pf.product_id=p.id LEFT JOIN pms_member_price m ON m.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN pms_sku_stock s ON s.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute_value a ON a.product_id=p.id LEFT JOIN pms_instalment_plant ins on ins.product_id=p.id WHERE p.id=#{id};

SELECT p.id id, p.`name` name, p.sub_title subTitle, p.price price, p.pic pic, p.product_attribute_category_id productAttributeCategoryId, p.product_category_id productCategoryId, p.stock stock, p.brand_name brandName, p.product_sn productSn, pa.id attr_id, pa.`name` attr_name, ps.id sku_id, ps.sku_code sku_code, ps.price sku_price, ps.sp1 sku_sp1, ps.sp2 sku_sp2, ps.sp3 sku_sp3, ps.stock sku_stock, ps.pic sku_pic FROM pms_product p LEFT JOIN pms_product_attribute pa ON p.product_attribute_category_id = pa.product_attribute_category_id LEFT JOIN pms_sku_stock ps ON p.id=ps.product_id WHERE p.id = #{id} AND pa.type = 0 ORDER BY pa.sort desc

SELECT p.id,p.pic,p.`name`,p.album_pics,p.new_status,p.sub_title,p.stock,p.price,p.detail_mobile_html,p.sort,ins.pay_periods,p.promotion_start_time, p.product_category_id productCategoryId,p.sale, c3.id AS ch_category_id, c3.`name` ch_category_name, c4.`name` pa_category_name, c4.id AS pa_category_id FROM pms_product p LEFT JOIN pms_product_category c3 ON p.product_category_id = c3.id LEFT JOIN pms_product_category c4 ON c3.parent_id = c4.id LEFT JOIN pms_instalment_plant ins ON p.id = ins.product_id WHERE p.delete_status = 0 AND p.publish_status = 1 AND p.recommand_status = 1 -- AND p.verify_status = 1 GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.sort DESC,p.sale DESC ,p.promotion_start_time DESC LIMIT 0,3

SELECT detail.* FROM ( SELECT product.*, IF ( @tmp = product.productCategoryId ,@rank :=@rank + 1 ,@rank := 1 ) AS new_rank, @tmp := product.productCategoryId AS tmp FROM ( SELECT RAND() AS r, p.id,p.pic,p.`name`,p.album_pics,p.new_status,p.sub_title,p.stock,p.price,p.detail_mobile_html,p.sort,ins.pay_periods, p.product_category_id productCategoryId, c3.id AS ch_category_id, c3.`name` ch_category_name, c4.`name` pa_category_name, c4.id AS pa_category_id FROM ( SELECT * FROM pms_product WHERE product_category_id IN ( SELECT category.child_id FROM ( SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT a.*, IF ( @tmp = a.id ,@rank :=@rank + 1 ,@rank := 1 ) AS new_rank, @tmp := a.id AS tmp FROM ( SELECT c1.sort AS pSort, c1.id, c1.`NAME`, c2.id child_id, c2.`NAME` child_name, c2.sort FROM ( SELECT * FROM pms_product_category WHERE parent_id = 0 ORDER BY sort DESC LIMIT 0, 3 ) c1 LEFT JOIN pms_product_category c2 ON c1.id = c2.parent_id ORDER BY pSort DESC, sort DESC ) a ORDER BY a.pSort DESC, a.sort DESC ) t WHERE t.new_rank <= 3 ) category ) ) p LEFT JOIN pms_product_category c3 ON p.product_category_id = c3.id LEFT JOIN pms_product_category c4 ON c3.parent_id = c4.id LEFT JOIN pms_instalment_plant ins ON p.id = ins.product_id WHERE p.delete_status = 0 AND p.publish_status = 1 -- AND p.verify_status = 1 GROUP BY id ORDER BY sort DESC, r DESC ) product ORDER BY pa_category_id DESC, productCategoryId DESC ) detail WHERE new_rank <= 6;

SELECT p.id,p.`name`,p.album_pics,p.new_status,p.sub_title,p.stock,p.price,p.detail_mobile_html,ins.pay_periods, s.id sku_id,s.sku_code sku_sku_code,s.price sku_price,s.stock sku_stock,s.pic sku_pic,s.dynamic_pros sku_dynamic_pros FROM pms_product p LEFT JOIN pms_sku_stock s ON s.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN pms_instalment_plant ins on ins.product_id=p.id WHERE p.id=#{id};
